profile.title: THE HUMAN BEHIND THE CODE
profile.subtitle: Technology is my tool, but human impact is my goal.

formation.title: Training and experience
formation.content: Software Engineering student at Universidad Cooperativa de Colombia with 2 years of practical experience. I've been a university teaching assistant, guiding students in technical concepts and collaborating on institutional projects.

methodologies.title: Methodologies and leadership
methodologies.content: Specialized in Scrum and agile methodologies, SOLID and KISS principles, with experience leading small teams in implementing best practices. Focus on comprehensive technical documentation and basic mentoring.

projects.title: Real projects
projects.content: Contributions in web development for educational institutions with WordPress, and currently optimizing processes for a poultry company with Django/MySQL/Flutter stack.

personal.title: The Human Being
personal.intro: Hi! I'm Nicolás Alejandro García Pasmiño. Throughout my life I've been called many names, so feel free to choose whichever you prefer. My hunger for knowledge didn't start at university, but much earlier, with a robotics course at age 8, fueled by an insatiable curiosity for technology, physics, and video games.
personal.hobbies: When I'm not immersed in the world of code, you'll probably find me sharing a good coffee (I'm a coffee enthusiast!), training with friends, or simply seeking a good conversation. I believe the best ideas and connections are born from those authentic moments.

music.title: Music Lover
music.description: I enjoy everything from salsa and Spanish rock to pop, rap, and a variety of musical genres in several languages. Sometimes I dare to play the drums.

sports.title: Gym & sports
sports.description: 2 years of gym discipline. Muay Thai is my favorite escape in my free time.

explorer.title: Explorer
explorer.description: I like traveling, discovering cultures, meditating, and connecting with nature.

philosophy.title: My Philosophy
philosophy.quote: I don't work more hours, I work smarter. Every line of code is one more hour to live.
philosophy.values: Automation → Efficiency → Freedom → A fulfilling life
